xml:
AdventureGuild_KillList_Header: ------------------------------
			 --Monster Eradication Goals--
 "Help us keep the valley safe."
------------------------------ #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_LineFormat: {0}/{1} {2} #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_LineFormat_None: {0}/{1} ???? #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_LineFormat_OverTarget: {0} {2} * #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Slimes: Slimes #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_VoidSpirits: Void Spirits #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Bats: Bats #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Skeletons: Skeletons #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_CaveInsects: Cave Insects #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Duggies: Duggies #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_DustSprites: Dust Sprites #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_RockCrabs: Rock Crabs #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Mummies: Mummies #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_PepperRex: Pepper Rex #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Serpent: Serpents #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_Footer: 
 -See Gil to claim your rewards. #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_RemoveEgg_Question: Remove the egg? #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_VoidEgg: A new chick hatched... It looks odd. #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_RegularEgg: A new baby chick hatched! #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_DuckEgg: A new baby duckling hatched! #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_DinosaurEgg: A new baby ...lizard?... hatched. #!String BeachNightMarket_Closed: Opens at 5pm. #!String BeachNightMarket_SubmarineInUse: The submarine is currently in use. Come back later. #!String BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverClosed: Merchant: The night market starts at 5pm... visit me then for a free cup of coffee! #!String BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverQuestion: Merchant: Hello there! Care for a cup of coffee? #!String BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverEnjoy: Merchant: Mmm... smells great, doesn't it? #!String BeachNightMarket_PainterClosed: Famous Painter Lupini: Come back when the market opens, if you wish to purchase my fine work. #!String BeachNightMarket_PainterQuestion: Famous Painter Lupini: I'm selling this painting for 1200g. What do you say? #!String BeachNightMarket_PainterSold: Famous Painter Lupini: My apologies... I have no more paintings to sell today. #!String BeachNightMarket_WarperQuestion: Shrouded Figure: I can send you home for 250g. #!String Beach_FixBridge_Question: Use 300 pieces of wood to fix the bridge? #!String Beach_FixBridge_Hint: Hmmm... With 300 pieces of wood this could be fixed. #!String Beach_GoneFishingMessage: Gone fishing.

 I'll be back tomorrow. #!String Beach_Mariner_Player_Male: lad #!String Beach_Mariner_Player_Female: miss #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerMarried: Old Mariner: Glad the amulet worked out for ye, {0}. #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: Old Mariner: Don't be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one you intend to marry. #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: Old Mariner: I can see that sparkle in yer eye, {0}. Ye must be head over heels in love. But I'm afraid a bigger house is essential for a happy marriage. #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: Old Mariner: Ah, I can see it in yer eyes... There be a special someone in yer heart. Just so happens I'm sellin' a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Give that to yer intended and they'll know exactly what you mean. #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_AnswerYes: Buy (5000g) #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_AnswerNo: Not now... #!String Beach_Mariner_PlayerNoRelationship: Old Mariner: I've got this old amulet to sell... but somethin' tells me yer not ready for it, {0}. #!String BuildableLocation_CantUpgrade_SomeoneInside: Can't upgrade while someone's inside. #!String BuildableLocation_CantUpgrade_IncorrectBuildingType: Incorrect Building Type #!String MineCart_Destination_Mines: Mines #!String MineCart_Destination_Town: Town #!String MineCart_Destination_BusStop: Bus Stop #!String MineCart_Destination_Quarry: Quarry #!String MineCart_Destination_Cancel: Cancel #!String MineCart_ChooseDestination: Choose destination: #!String MineCart_OutOfOrder: Out of order #!String BusStop_BuyTicketToDesert: Buy a ticket to Calico Desert for 500g? #!String BusStop_DesertOutOfService: The bus to Calico Desert is out of service. #!String BusStop_NotEnoughMoneyForTicket: You don't have enough money. #!String BusStop_NoDriver: Please return when a bus driver is present. #!String BusStop_ReturnToHorse1: {0} is wondering where you've been. #!String BusStop_ReturnToHorse2: Your loyal horse waits patiently for your return. #!String Club_Bouncer_TextAboveHead1: Now I'm angry! #!String Club_Bouncer_TextAboveHead2: You little punk... #!String CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion1: We are the Junimos... Keepers of the forest. #!String CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion2: This house was empty for years... The trees moved in and so did we. #!String CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion3: We're happy to help... It's not our house, after all. #!String CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion4: So many wonderful bundles... thank you! Thank you! #!String CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion5: When we're done here, we'll return to the other world. #!String CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion6: The last bundle... Farewell... {0}. #!String CommunityCenter_AreaRestored: The {0} has been restored! #!String CommunityCenter_JunimosReturned: The Junimos have returned to the spirit world. #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_BoilerRoom: Boiler Room #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_BulletinBoard: Bulletin Board #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_CraftsRoom: Crafts Room #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_FishTank: Fish Tank #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_Pantry: Pantry #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_Vault: Vault #!String CommunityCenter_AreaName_AbandonedJojaMart: Abandoned JojaMart #!String Desert_Return_Question: Return to Stardew Valley? #!String Desert_Return_Yes: Yes #!String Desert_Return_No: Not yet #!String Farm_1SlimeEscaped: A slime escaped during the night. #!String Farm_NSlimesEscaped: {0} slimes escaped during the night. #!String Farm_GrandpaNote: {0}-

Wait for my return on the dawn of your third year.

-Grandpa #!String Farm_GrandpaShrine_PlaceDiamond: You place the diamond on Grandpa's Shrine. #!String Farm_GrandpaShrine_DiamondSlot: There's a diamond-shaped slot in the shrine... was that always there? #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked1: What the...? #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked2: Ahh!! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked3: &@#$!! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked4: Aiii! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked5: Die! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked6: Get out! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked7: Yuck! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked8: Take that! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked9: Help! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked10: Get your sword! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked11: Agh! #!String FarmHouse_SpouseAttacked12: Gahh! #!String Forest_WizardTower_Locked: It's locked. You can hear someone inside, though. #!String Forest_OpenedSewer: You unlock the sewer hatch with the Rusty Key! #!String Forest_HatMouseStore_Abandoned: It looks abandoned... #!String Desert_BusArrived: Alright, kid. Just get back on the bus when you're ready to go home. #!String Bus_NoDriver: You'll have to wait until Pam's on duty to ride the bus. #!String DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Male: You're not good enough friends with {0} to enter his bedroom. #!String DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Female: You're not good enough friends with {0} to enter her bedroom. #!String DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Couple: You're not good enough friends with {0} or {1} to enter their bedroom. #!String FarmHouse_Bed_GoToSleep: Go to sleep for the night? #!String MensLocker_WrongGender: That's the men's locker room... you can't go in there! #!String WomensLocker_WrongGender: That's the women's locker room... you can't go in there! #!String Saloon_ColaMachine_Question: Buy a Joja Cola for 75g? #!String IceCreamStand_ComeBackLater: Come back when someone's working. #!String IceCreamStand_NotSummer: Closed until summer. #!String WizardTower_WizardShrine: The Shrine Of Illusions 
Make an offering of 500g to change your appearance? #!String SeedShop_BuyBackpack_Response2000: Purchase (2,000g) #!String SeedShop_BuyBackpack_Response10000: Purchase (10,000g) #!String SeedShop_BuyBackpack_ResponseNo: Not now #!String SeedShop_BuyBackpack_Question24: Backpack Upgrade -- 24 slots #!String SeedShop_BuyBackpack_Question36: Backpack Upgrade -- 36 slots #!String Club_Buy100Coins: Buy 100 Qi Coins for 1,000g? #!String Desert_SandDragon_Initial: Its maw gapes at the desert sun. Even in death, it yearns for a taste. #!String Desert_SandDragon_ConsumeEssence: You place the essence in the dragon's maw. Only then do you notice a note hidden in the eye socket: #!String Desert_SandDragon_MrQiNote: 'You've proven yourself, kid. Check out the pile of lumber next to your house. -Mr. Qi' #!String Railroad_Box_Initial: It's an empty box. #!String Railroad_Box_ConsumeShell: You throw the shell into the box. Immediately, a note falls down from the rafters above: #!String Railroad_Box_MrQiNote: 'Well done. Your next task: Place 10 beets inside Mayor's fridge. -Mr. Qi' #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_Singleplayer: Pelican Town Ledger Book... It looks like the mayor uses this to keep track of finances. #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_NoFarmhands: If any farmhands join your farm, you can transfer money to each other. #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Client: Pelican Town Ledger Book... The owner of the farm can request the mayor to split the funds of the farmhands. #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_SeparateQuestion: Split the funds of each farmer? Tonight, the money will be divided evenly. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end. #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_CancelQuestion: Cancel splitting up funds? #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_HostQuestion: It's the mayor's ledger book. What would you like to do? #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SendMoney: Send Money #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_MergeWallets: Merge Funds #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_CancelMerge: Cancel Merging Funds #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_Leave: Leave #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_TransferCancel: Cancel #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_MergeQuestion: Merge the funds of each farmer? Tonight, everyone's money will be combined. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end. #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_CancelQuestion: Cancel merging funds? #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_TransferQuestion: Who would you like to send money to? #!String ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_HowMuchQuestion: How much money would you like to send? #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_NoSpouse: Pelican Town Marriage Log... After marriage, you may file for divorce here. Let's hope that isn't necessary! #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question: File for divorce? There is a 50,000g fee. #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_CancelQuestion: Cancel your divorce? #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled: Your divorce request has been cancelled. #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed: Your divorce papers have been filed, but your spouse won't know until tomorrow morning. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end. #!String ManorHouse_MayorFridge_Initial: It's the mayor's fridge. It's mostly full of milk and iced tea. #!String ManorHouse_MayorFridge_ConsumeBeets: You quickly place the beets in the fridge. Wait a sec... there's a note taped to the milk. It's addressed to you: #!String ManorHouse_MayorFridge_MrQiNote: 'Good job, kid. Your final task: Give the sand dragon his last meal. -Mr. Qi' #!String Tunnel_TunnelSafe_Initial: It's a battery powered lock-box. Unfortunately, there's no battery in it. #!String Tunnel_TunnelSafe_ConsumeBattery: It worked! The lock-box swings open. Inside, there's a note: #!String Tunnel_TunnelSafe_MrQiNote: 'Your first task: Bring a rainbow shell to the train platform. Leave it in the box. -Mr. Qi' #!String SkullCave_SkullDoor_Locked: The door is locked. #!String SkullCave_SkullDoor_Unlock: You insert the skull key into the keyhole. It's a perfect fit! #!String FarmHouse_Crib_NewbornSleeping: {0} is sleeping. #!String Farm_GreenhouseRuins: Whatever this once was, it's now in ruins. #!String Saloon_Arcade_Minecart_Menu: = Junimo Kart = #!String Saloon_Arcade_Minecart_ProgressMode: Progress Mode #!String Saloon_Arcade_Minecart_EndlessMode: Endless Mode #!String Saloon_Arcade_Minecart_Exit: Exit #!String Saloon_Arcade_PK_NewGame+: Press button for a more difficult journey... #!String Saloon_Arcade_Minecart_Inactive: There's a skull-shaped keyhole... #!String AnimalShop_Marnie_Trash: Mostly empty pizza cartons. #!String JoshHouse_Alex_Trash: There's a bunch of protein bar wrappers. #!String SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like Sam cleans his trash bin regularly. #!String SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: It's full of clothes... wait. There's a sword hidden under the clothes. #!String Submarine_SubmergeQuestion: Captain: Ahoy there! Want to take the deep-sea fishing tour? It'll cost ya 1,000g. #!String Submarine_AscendQuestion: Captain: Shall I take us back up? #!String Submarine_Done: Captain: We're back! Make sure not to leave any fish lying around. #!String Mines_MineElevator_NotWorking: It doesn't seem to be working... #!String Mines_LeaveMine: Leave the mine #!String Mines_GoUp: Go up one level #!String Mines_DoNothing: Do nothing #!String Mines_ResetMine: Reset your progress in the mine?
(You'll be back at mine level 1). #!String RemoveChest: You remove the empty chest. #!String Club_CalicoJack_HS: This table's for the big shots. It's a 1000 coin bet. #!String Club_CalicoJack: Wanna play some CalicoJack? This is the 100 coin table. #!String Club_CalicoJack_Play: Play #!String Club_CalicoJack_Leave: Leave #!String Club_CalicoJack_Rules: Rules #!String Club_QiCoins: You have {0} Club Coins. #!String Club_QiCoins_BuyStarter: You have 0 Club Coins. Buy a starter pack for 1000g? #!String Club_QiCoins_NotEnoughMoney: Error: Not enough money. #!String Club_ClubSeller: Psst... I have a 'Statue of Endless Fortune' for sale... only 1,000,000g. What do you say? #!String Club_ClubSeller_Yes: I'll take it. #!String Club_ClubSeller_No: No way! #!String Club_ClubSeller_NotEnoughMoney: Hey, I said 1,000,000g! This isn't gonna cut it. #!String Secret_Note_Name: Secret Note #!String Town_DwarfGrave_Translated: You translate the dwarvish: 

Stand between the pillars three
With gift as precious as the sky:
A rainbow forged from land, not sea
Then galaxies will heed your cry.
 #!String Town_mgThiefMessage: Shadow Guy: Eeeeep! You caught me! I'm sorry! Take it! Take it! It looked so valuable, I couldn't help myself... #!String Town_SpecialCharmQuestion: Driver: Hey kid... I need a lucky break... why don't 'cha bring me a 'rabbit's foot'? I'll make it worth your while. #!String Town_specialCharmNoFoot: Driver: Come back when you got a 'rabbit's foot' on ya, kid. #!String SeedShop_Yoba: Altar of Yoba #!String ElliottHouse_ElliottBook_Blank: Blank book #!String ElliottHouse_ElliottBook_Filled: '{0}' by Elliott ... Dedicated to {1} #!String FestivalDay_DoorLocked: It's locked... #!String SeedShop_LockedWed: Closed on Wednesdays. #!String LockedDoor: It's locked... #!String LockedDoor_OpenRange: It's locked... (Open {0} - {1}) #!String LockedDoor_FriendsOnly: It's locked... Only {0}'s friends can enter uninvited. #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu: What can I do for you? #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_Shop: Shop #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_UpgradeHouse: Upgrade House #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_CommunityUpgrade: Community Upgrade #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_Construct: Construct Farm Buildings #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_Leave: Leave #!String ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent: Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at Caroline's place for aerobics club.

-Robin #!String Blacksmith_Clint_Shop: Shop #!String Blacksmith_Clint_Upgrade: Upgrade Tools #!String Blacksmith_Clint_Leave: Leave #!String Blacksmith_Clint_Geodes: Process Geodes #!String AnimalShop_Marnie_Supplies: Supplies Shop #!String AnimalShop_Marnie_Animals: Purchase Animals #!String AnimalShop_Marnie_Leave: Leave #!String AnimalShop_Marnie_Absent: Closed for the day.

-Marnie #!String ArchaeologyHouse_Gunther_Donate: Donate To Museum #!String ArchaeologyHouse_Gunther_Collect: Collect Rewards #!String ArchaeologyHouse_Gunther_Leave: Leave #!String ArchaeologyHouse_Rearrange: Would you like to rearrange the museum's collection? #!String HaleyHouse_EmilyRoomObject: There's a tape inside:'Freeform Dance Rhythyms' #!String Club_Bouncer_PlayerClubMember: You may enter. #!String Club_CalicoJack_Rules1: The objective is to get as close to 21 as possible. Cards range from 1 to 9, except for the first card which can be as high as 11. Each player starts with two cards, but the dealer's first card remains hidden. Each turn you can choose to draw a random number between 1 and 9 or pass. #!String Club_CalicoJack_Rules2: Once you pass, the dealer's hidden card is revealed. She must draw until her total reaches or exceeds 18. If either player exceeds 21 on their turn, they lose. If the dealer passes, then all cards are revealed and the highest score wins. #!String Club_CalicoJackHS_NotEnoughCoins: You need at least 1000 coins to play here. #!String Club_CalicoJack_NotEnoughCoins: Hey, the betting's fixed at 100 coins. You don't have enough. Go buy some coins from the machine if you want to play. #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse1: I can increase the size of your house and add a kitchen. It will cost 10,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 450 pieces of wood. Are you interested? #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse2: I can increase the size of your house and add a nursery. It will cost 50,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 150 pieces of hardwood. Are you interested? #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse3: I can add a cellar to your house. The cellar can be used to age certain products, like wine and cheese. It will cost 100,000g. Are you interested? #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...What's that? You want to build Pam a house? That's a great idea!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g... #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood1: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 450 pieces of wood. #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood2: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 150 pieces of hardwood. #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood3: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 950 pieces of wood. #!String Farm_WeedsDestruction: The spreading weeds have caused damage to your farm. #!String JojaMart_SignUp: If you become a Joja Member, the community center will become a Joja Warehouse, and you will no longer be able to refurbish it. However, Joja will provide an alternative means to improving the town. Are you sure you want to join? #!String Mines_Infested: This area is infested... #!String Mines_Overrun: This area is overrun with monsters. #!String Mines_Fallen: You fell {0} levels. #!String Mines_FallenFar: You fell {0} levels. Ouch! #!String Mines_ShaftJumpIn: Jump In #!String Mines_Shaft: There's a shaft leading down. #!String Mountain_AdventurersGuildNote: * Adventurer's Guild *

 Proven adventurers only. #!String Railroad_TrainComing: A train is passing through Stardew Valley #!String Town_SeedShopSign: - Pierre's General Store -
Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm! #!String Town_JojaSign_Destroyed: Out of Business. #!String Town_PickupTruck: It's just the back of Lewis' old pickup truck... #!String Sewer_DogStatue: -Statue Of Uncertainty-^The statue can help you change professions.^Make an offering of 10,000g? #!String Sewer_DogStatueCancel: None, I changed my mind... #!String Sewer_DogStatueQuestion: Which skill's professions would you like to change? #!String Sewer_DogStatueAlready: This skill is already being altered tonight. Come back tomorrow... #!String Sewer_DogStatueFinished: *woof* *woof* (It's done... now go to sleep...) #!String WitchHut_EvilShrineLeft: -Dark Shrine of Selfishness-^Your children will turn into doves and fly away...^Make an offering of one Prismatic Shard? #!String WitchHut_EvilShrineLeftInactive: -Dark Shrine of Selfishness-^The statue stares through you...
 #!String WitchHut_EvilShrineCenter: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The relationship between you and your ex-spouses will be wiped from memory. It will be like you've never met.^Make an offering of 30,000g?
 #!String WitchHut_Goodbye: Goodbye, {0}. #!String WitchHut_EvilShrineCenterInactive: -Dark Shrine of Memory-^The statue stares through you...
 #!String WitchHut_EvilShrineRightActivate: -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be lifted, allowing monsters to appear on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?
 #!String WitchHut_EvilShrineRightDeActivate: 
 -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be restored, preventing monsters from appearing on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?
 #!String WitchHut_NoOffering: You don't have the necessary offering. #!String Sewer_MagicSeal: There's some kind of force-field blocking your path. #!String Woods_Statue: --Old Master Cannoli--
...Still searching for the sweetest taste... #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_UpgradeCabin: Upgrade Cabin #!String AdventureGuild_ItemRecovery: Item Recovery Service #!String AdventureGuild_Greeting: Need something? #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question_Krobus: Kick {0} out of your house? #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_CancelQuestion_Krobus: Cancel your eviction? #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled_Krobus: You've changed your mind about kicking {0} out. #!String ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed_Krobus: You've decided to kick {0} out of the house. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end. #!String Theater_Poster_0: Now Playing: "{0}." #!String Theater_Poster_1: "{0}" #!String Theater_Poster_Coming_Soon: Coming soon: "{0}." #!String Theater_MovieEnd: The movie has concluded for tonight. We hope you enjoyed the show! #!String Theater_MovieEndReEntry: The movie has concluded. #!String HaleyHouse_SewingMachine: It's a sewing machine... But I'm not sure how to use it. #!String HaleyHouse_DyePot: An array of brightly colored dyes. #!String Caroline_Sunroom_Door: Caroline only lets her friends enter here... #!String Caroline_Tea_Event1: When I'm alone with relaxing tea... #!String Caroline_Tea_Event2: My mind is empty and free to wander... #!String Caroline_Tea_Event3: Who knows what might appear? #!String Desert_Trader_Closed: Closed until the 18th for the Pelican Town night market. #!String Farm_OtherPlayerMailbox: That's not your mailbox. #!String BoatTunnel_BuyTicket: Buy a ticket for {0}g? #!String IslandNorth_CaveHelp_0: Help! #!String IslandNorth_CaveHelp_1: Anyone there? #!String IslandNorth_CaveHelp_2: I'm stuck! #!String IslandNorth_CaveHelp_3: Over here! #!String IslandNorth_CaveTool_0: That won't work. #!String IslandNorth_CaveTool_1: It's too weak. #!String IslandNorth_CaveTool_2: Hmm... #!String IslandNorth_CaveTool_3: Try something else. #!String IslandNorth_Event_SafariManAppear: tropical_island_day_ambient/-1000 -100/farmer 20 48 1/skippable/pause 1000/viewport 21 47 true/pause 1000/playSound thudStep/addTemporaryActor SafariGuy 16 32 22 45 2 true ???/move SafariGuy 0 3 3/pause 1000/speak SafariGuy \Thank you! I thought I was done for... $h#$b#I've been stuck in this cave for months!/pause 500/faceDirection SafariGuy 2/pause 300/showFrame SafariGuy 16/pause 600/emote SafariGuy 28/speak SafariGuy \...One more cave mushroom salad and I would've gone off the deep end... *shudder* ...so rubbery...$s/pause 500/showFrame SafariGuy 0/pause 500/faceDirection SafariGuy 3/pause 500/changeName SafariGuy Professor_Snail/speak SafariGuy \Anyway... I'm Professor Snail.#$b#I've been conducting a survey of this island's flora and fauna for the last year. Truly a remarkable place!/pause 400/faceDirection SafariGuy 2/pause 250/faceDirection SafariGuy 3/speak SafariGuy \Well, I think I'll go back to my tent and freshen up a little. I'm afraid I smell like mushrooms...$s#$b#Hey... you should stop by the tent sometime! An enterprising individual like yourself could be a major asset in my projects... hee hee! Farewell.$h/pause 200/showFrame SafariGuy 17/pause 800/showFrame SafariGuy 12/pause 200/advancedMove SafariGuy true 1 0 0 4/pause 250/end position 20 48 #!String IslandFieldOffice_Welcome_0: Greetings! #!String IslandFieldOffice_Welcome_1: Hello! #!String IslandFieldOffice_Welcome_2: Hey! #!String IslandFieldOffice_Welcome_3: Welcome! #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Yes: Ready to report #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Notyet: Not ready #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Prompt_LeftPlant: Island Survey -- Please report the number of purple flowers present on the island. #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleFlower_Question: How many purple flowers can be found on the island? #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleFlower_Wrong: Hmm... That number doesn't fit my models at all... Maybe you should give it another shot tomorrow.$s #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleFlower_Correct: Yes, yes... that seems very accurate. Thank you!$h #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Prompt_RightPlant: Island Survey -- Please report the number of purple starfish present on the island. #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_PurpleStarfish_Question: How many purple starfish can be found on the island? #!String IslandFieldOffice_Survey_Failed: Hmm... I think you should take a break and try doing the survey again tomorrow... #!String IslandFieldOffice_Intro_Event: fieldofficeTentMusic/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 10 0/skippable/addTemporaryActor SafariGuy 16 32 5 4 0 true Professor_Snail/viewport 4 6 true/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 1000/faceDirection SafariGuy 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection SafariGuy 2 true/pause 500/speak SafariGuy \Ah... Come in!/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 3/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/pause 500/speak SafariGuy \Welcome to my field office./faceDirection SafariGuy 2/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame SafariGuy 16/emote SafariGuy 28/pause 500/speak SafariGuy \As you can see... it's quite empty.$s#$b#Getting stuck in that cave was a huge setback to my project.$s/pause 50/showFrame SafariGuy 0/pause 200/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/pause 100/speak SafariGuy \But that's where you come in! Hee hee...$h/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/speak SafariGuy \I'm in the bone business, you see...#$b#Ancient bones, in particular... And this island is full of them.#$b#So if you ever encounter any bones, fossils, or mummified specimens on this island, bring them to my desk, okay? I'll make it worth your while!$h/pause 200/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/end #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_RenovateHouse: Make House Renovations #!String ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu_RenovateCabin: Make Cabin Renovations #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveCrib: Remove Crib/Remove the crib from your home./Select a crib to remove. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_BuildCrib: Build Crib/Builds a crib in your home./Select a location for the crib. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_OpenBedroom: Open Bedroom/Removes the wall separating your bedroom and the entrance room./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_CloseBedroom: Close Bedroom/Builds a wall separating your bedroom and the entrance room./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_AddSouthernRoom: Add Southern Room/Adds a room to the south of your bedroom./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveSouthernRoom: Remove Southern Room/Removes the room to the south of your bedroom./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_AddCornerRoom: Add Corner Room/Adds a room in the northeast corner of the house./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveCornerRoom: Remove Corner Room/Removes the room in the northeast corner of the house./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_AddCornerStairs: Add Corner Stairs/Adds a staircase from your bedroom to the corner room./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveCornerStairs: Remove Corner Stairs/Removes the staircase from your bedroom to the corner room./Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_AddStairs: Add Stairs/Adds a staircase in one of several locations/Select an area for the renovation. #!String ScienceHouse_Renovation_RemoveStairs: Remove Stairs/Remove a staircase./Select an area for the renovation. #!String Journal_Name: Journal Scrap #!String IslandFarmhouse_Drawer: You open the drawer and find a tattered journal... #!String Gourmand_Intro: Kribbibbit... Whooo? You da farmer who tend-a da land outside me house, bub? #!String Gourmand_RequestIntro: Gurrp... Dah land once teemed wis fresh, fresh fooda... *sigh*... me wish ta seein' da teemin' once more. #!String Gourmand_RequestQuestion: You be growin' da thing outside now, bub? #!String Gourmand_RequestFailed: Kriibbitt... You no grow da thing I wish-a da see... Grow dis a thing and return-a ta me.. #!String Gourmand_Request_0: Grow you for me... da pink thing... da juicy thing... #!String Gourmand_Request_0_Success: Gurrrp... Yes. Bombo pink... Bombo juicy...|...Bringin' me back to da good old days... sunny days when things bein' sweeter...|*slurp*... Me wanna take a big bombo juicy bite...|...But, me won't. #!String Gourmand_Request_1: Me wanna see da longo yellow ticklin' thing... da thing dat be wavin' in the wind... #!String Gourmand_Request_1_Success: Gurrrp... Good. Bombo longo and when da run through it... bombo ticklin'.|Heh... remindin' me of an old girlfriend... *gurp*...|Heh... Now me wanna tickle-da you...|...But, me won't. #!String Gourmand_Request_2: Me wanna eat da zesty ground-fruit, but make da breath stink... #!String Gourmand_Request_2_Success: Gurrrp... Yes... Me eatin' da thing once. Made da breath smell bombo bad...|...Remindin' me of Papa when I was just a tadpole...|Heh... Me wanna take a big bite, and smell bombo bad...|...But, me won't. #!String Gourmand_Reward: Kriibbitt... Yes... Thank-a da you. This bringin' me back... To da good times, long, long ago, bub...|Here... This da for you. #!String Gourmand_LastReward: Kriibbitt... Yes... Me remember everything now!|Thank-a da you for remindin' me so much.|This da one last reward for you, bub. #!String Gourmand_Finished: Kriibbitt... Good to see you again, bombo-friend.|I hope a you growin' da big bombo fruit, bub! #!String Gourmand_InProgress: Ah... I see you growin' da thing. But it's still ding-ee small. Come back when it's bombo big... #!String Saloon_Arcade_Cowboy_Menu: = Journey Of The Prairie King = #!String Saloon_Arcade_Cowboy_Continue: Continue Journey #!String Saloon_Arcade_Cowboy_NewGame: Start New Journey #!String IslandHut_Event_ParrotBoyIntro: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 7 3/skippable/specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 777/addTemporaryActor ParrotBoy 16 32 5 2 2 true ???/pause 2000/viewport 5 7 true/pause 2000/emote ParrotBoy 8/pause 1500/message \The boy looks at you with curious eyes.../pause 1500/animate ParrotBoy false true 500 17 0/playSound parrot_squawk/pause 1000/playSound parrot_squawk/pause 800/stopAnimation ParrotBoy/specificTemporarySprite parrotHutSquawk/pause 800/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/message \He seems to have a close bond with the parrots./pause 500/message \But he's too shy to approach you right now./pause 1400/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/message \Perhaps making friends with the parrots could earn his trust?/pause 1000/end position 5 7 #!String IslandSecret_Event_BirdieIntro: tropical_island_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 20 58 3/skippable/addTemporaryActor Birdie 32 32 17 58 3 true ???/animate Birdie false true 1000 8 9/pause 1000/viewport 18 58 clamp true/pause 1000/emote Birdie 8/pause 1000/speak Birdie "Oh... a visitor?#$b#Come closer, child."/pause 400/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 300/emote Birdie 40/speak Birdie "I haven't had a visitor in many moons...$s#$b#I almost forgot what other people looked like!"/pause 1000/speak Birdie "Well, I suppose now that you're here, I may as well ask you for a favor."/pause 500/textAboveHead Birdie "Come..."/pause 500/playFramesAhead 3/stopAnimation Birdie/extendSourceRect Birdie reset/warp Birdie 18 58/viewport move 1 0 2000/move Birdie 0 -1 2/move Birdie 2 0 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/speak Birdie "Have you seen that wrecked ship on the south shore?#$b# My husband was the captain. A pirate, he was.#$b#He set sail one day, never to return. Took me three years sailing the high seas to find his remains.$s"/emote Birdie 28/speak Birdie "*sigh*...$s#$b#I've been here ever since, dear.$s#$b#...Guarding his bones..."/faceDirection farmer 2 true/playSound batScreech/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Birdie 2/speak Birdie "My child... If I could only find a keepsake of his, it would bring me such peace.$s"/pause 400/textAboveHead Birdie "Wait here..."/move Birdie -1 0 0/move Birdie 0 -1 3/warp Birdie -100 -100/playSound doorClose/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Birdie 2/pause 1000/playSound Ship/pause 1000/playSound Ship/playSound crafting/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp Birdie 20 56/move Birdie 0 1 2/speak Birdie "Here, take this. It's an old photograph that washed up on shore.#$b#It's all I have to offer... but somehow, I think it will help you find what I seek."/pause 500/unskippable/playSound coin/awardFestivalPrize memento true/pause 10/addQuest 130/pause 1700/end #!String IslandSecret_Event_BirdieFinished: tropical_island_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 20 58 3/removeQuest 130/skippable/addTemporaryActor Birdie 32 32 17 58 3 true ???/animate Birdie false true 1000 8 9/pause 1000/viewport 18 58 clamp true/pause 2300/playMusic none/animate farmer true true 100 35/addObject 19 58 870/playSound sandyStep/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/playFramesAhead 3/stopAnimation Birdie/extendSourceRect Birdie reset/warp Birdie 18 58/move Birdie 0 -1 2/move Birdie 1 0 2/pause 500/jump Birdie/pause 500/playMusic desolate/speak Birdie "It's his...$s"/emote Birdie 20/pause 1200/playSound coin/removeObject 19 58/showFrame Birdie 20/pause 2500/speak Birdie "Heh... It still has his smell, after all these years...#$b#...that familiar, putrid funk...$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2 true/playSound croak/animate farmer false false 350 104 105 104 105 104 105/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Birdie "You know... It's been a lonely life here, child... but I don't regret it at all.#$b#I'm doin' right by my old man... and we'll be together again some day soon... hehe"/pause 500/stopAnimation Birdie/move Birdie 0 1 3/playMusic tropical_island_day_ambient/faceDirection Birdie 1/quickQuestion #It's an honorable thing to do.#He's gone. You should live your life.(break)speak Birdie "You have great wisdom, child.#$b#And you've brought me great peace... this locket will comfort me for the rest of my days.$h"(break)emote Birdie 28\speak Birdie "An old woman like me? I think it's too late, dear...$s#$b#Besides... I like it here! It's relaxing and beautiful. And I have an endless supply of fresh fish, oysters, and monkey meat. Hehehe.$h#$b#...I'm kidding about the monkey meat."/pause 1000/speak Birdie "Now... how can I repay you for this?"/jump Birdie/pause 500/speak Birdie "Oh... How about I teach you a special recipe... Something I discovered in the many years I've spent here."/pause 1000/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Fairy Dust/message "Learned to craft 'Fairy Dust'."/pause 1000/fork gotBirdieReward Strings\\Locations:alreadyGotNuts true/speak Birdie "You can take these, too..."/awardFestivalPrize birdieReward true/pause 1000/speak Birdie "Though you're a stranger, you went out of your way to help an old lady.#$b#Bless your heart!$h"/emote Birdie 20/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end #!String alreadyGotNuts: pause 50/pause 50/pause 1000/speak Birdie "Though you're a stranger, you went out of your way to help an old lady.#$b#Bless your heart!$h"/emote Birdie 20/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end #!String qiNutDoor: You hear a strange voice from behind the door...#'Only the greatest walnut hunters may enter here.'^ Your current status: {0}/100 #!String BoatTunnel_DonateBatteries: Donate 5 battery packs to repair the ticket machine? #!String BoatTunnel_DonateHardwood: Donate 200 hardwood for hull repairs? #!String BoatTunnel_DonateIridium: Donate 5 iridium bars to repair the anchor? #!String BoatTunnel_DonateBatteriesHint: This machine could be repaired with 5 battery packs. #!String BoatTunnel_DonateHardwoodHint: The hull could be repaired with 200 pieces of hardwood. #!String BoatTunnel_DonateIridiumHint: The anchor could be repaired with 5 iridium bars. #!String BoatTunnel_boatcomplete: All materials have been found!#The boat will be repaired overnight. #!String BoatTunnel_willyText_firstRide: She looks good as new! #!String BoatTunnel_willyText_random0: Sorry if I smell like fish, heh! #!String BoatTunnel_willyText_random1: Ahoy! #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_Ostrich: A new ostrich chick hatched... it's a big one! #!String FieldOfficeFinale: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 8 0/addCraftingRecipe Ostrich Incubator/addMailReceived fieldOfficeFinale/skippable/addTemporaryActor SafariGuy 16 32 3 8 0 true Professor_Snail/pause 1000/viewport 4 6 true/pause 4000/speak SafariGuy \Wow...#$b#Look how far we've come!$h/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/speak SafariGuy \The collection looks fantastic, and it's all thanks to you, @./emote farmer 32/speak SafariGuy \Here, as a way of saying 'thanks', I want to teach you something./faceDirection farmer 3/pause 700/playSound reward/message \Learned how to craft 'Ostrich Incubator'/pause 400/speak SafariGuy \This device will allow you to raise ostriches back home. Just place the incubator in a barn, place an ostrich egg inside, and wait.../faceDirection SafariGuy 0/speak SafariGuy \Getting your hands on an ostrich egg is a different story, though... I'll leave that up to you!/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak SafariGuy \Heh... Well... now the real work begins.#$b#I'll be studying these bones for years to come!/faceDirection SafariGuy 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak SafariGuy \Farewell, @!/pause 600/end #!String NutHint_Squawk: *Awk* #!String NutHint_VolcanoLava: Fire mountain... Hidden down fire river... #!String NutHint_BuriedArch: Buried near bones... #!String NutHint_Arch: Help man in tent... #!String NutHint_NorthBuried: {0} buried in the north... #!String NutHint_WestBuried: {0} buried in the west... #!String NutHint_SouthBuried: {0} buried in the south... #!String NutHint_NorthHidden: {0} hidden in the north... #!String NutHint_HutTree: Bulging very close by... #!String NutHint_TigerSlime: Stripey slimes to the west... #!String NutHint_MusselStone: {0} stuck in shelly stones by shore... #!String NutHint_IslandFarming: {0} grow on the farm to the west... #!String NutHint_WestHidden: {0} hidden in the west... #!String NutHint_IslandFishing: {0} deep in the water... #!String NutHint_VolcanoTreasure: {0} hidden in fire mountain treasures... #!String NutHint_VolcanoBarrel: {0} encased in fire mountain gadgets... #!String NutHint_VolcanoMining: {0} nutty stone in fire mountain... #!String NutHint_VolcanoMonsters: {0} taken by monsters in fire mountain... #!String NutHint_Journal: Hidden in the pages of the journal... #!String NutHint_SouthEastBuried: {0} buried... Pirate's cove... #!String NutHint_StardropPool: Bathing in the heart of the star... #!String NutHint_Caldera: Atop fire mountain... #!String NutHint_Gourmand: Kribbit... Gurrrp... #!String NutHint_IslandShrine: Hidden shrine in rain forest... #!String NutHint_GoldenCoconut: Inside hard, gold thing... #!String IslandSouth_ResortOpenSign: The beach resort is open. Temporarily close it down tomorrow? #!String IslandSouth_ResortOpenWillCloseSign: The beach resort will temporarily close tomorrow. Keep it open? #!String IslandSouth_ResortClosedSign: The beach resort is temporarily closed. Open it back up tomorrow? #!String IslandSouth_ResortClosedWillOpenSign: The beach resort will open back up tomorrow. Keep it closed? #!String IslandSouth_ResortWillOpenSign: The beach resort will be open tomorrow. #!String IslandSouth_ResortWillCloseSign: The beach resort will be closed tomorrow. #!String ManorHouse_LAF_Check: The town's 'Lost and Found' box. #!String ManorHouse_LAF_Check_OrdersUnlocked: The town's 'Lost and Found' box. You can collect incomplete deliveries from past special orders here. #!String ManorHouse_LAF_DonationItems: Collect lost items and incomplete deliveries #!String ManorHouse_LAF_FarmhandItems: Retrieve items from offline farmhands #!String ManorHouse_LAF_FarmhandItemsQuestion: Who would you like to retrieve items from? #!String FieldOfficeDonated_0: Ah... Now this is a truly fascinating piece of natural history! Thank you. #!String FieldOfficeDonated_1: Beautiful! These bones are exactly what I'm looking for. Now, let me clean my magnifying lens... #!String FieldOfficeDonated_2: You've outdone yourself, @. This is one of the most pristine specimens I've ever seen. Thank you!$h #!String FieldOfficeDonated_3: To think... generations have come and gone while this little bone lay hidden beneath the soil. Now it's mine! #!String FieldOfficeDonated_Reward: And would you look at that! With this donation, we've got another full set piece completed.$h#$b#I've got a little something waiting for you behind the counter, when you're ready for it! #!String Volcano_ShortcutOut: Take the shortcut out of the volcano? #!String SeedShop_MoneyBox: I'm taking the day off to visit the island. Please place your money in the box. No cheating!^ -Pierre #!String AnimalShop_MoneyBox: I'm visiting the island today. If you need to buy anything, just leave the money in this box!^ -Marnie #!String Saloon_MoneyBox: I'm tending the bar on Ginger Island today, but I won't let that stop you from buying something!^ -Gus #!String ScienceHouse_MoneyBox: I'm on the island today, but you can still buy something. It's an honor system!^ -Robin #!String ChallengeShrine_NotYetHard: --Shrine Of Challenge--^Dispel the ancient magi-seal of protection, allowing powerful monsters to ascend from the deep? #!String ChallengeShrine_AlreadyHard: --Shrine Of Challenge--^Summon an ancient magi-seal protection, returning the mines to their original state? #!String ChallengeShrine_Activated: Your request will be granted overnight. #!String ChallengeShrine_AlreadyActive: You've already put in a request. #!String ChallengeShrine_OnQiChallenge: There's a note from Mr. Qi: ^ I've temporarily disabled this shrine. Come back tomorrow! #!String Gil_Telephone: Hey. 150 Magma Sprites, huh? I'm impressed.#$b#Tell you what... I'm gonna give you Marlon's tellie-phone number. He don't like me givin' it out, but I think you've earned it.#$b#If you ever need to use the Item Recovery Service, but don't wanna run all the way out here... just give us a ring. Sound good? #!String AdventureGuild_KillList_MagmaSprite: Magma Sprites #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_HouseFull: An egg is ready to hatch, but the building is full. #!String SandDuggy: Sand Duggy #!String TravelingMerchant: Traveling Merchant #!String ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade2: ...What's that? You'd like me to add a few shortcuts around the valley? Sure, I can do that!^I'll just need 300,000g... #!String AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_GoldenEgg: A sparkling golden chick hatched! #!String SummitBoulder: It seems impossible to budge... #!String Hint: Hint #!String
